devdoc.author: Set Protocol Contract that houses state for approvals and system contracts such as added Sets, modules, factories, resources (like price oracles), and protocol fee configurations.

params._factory: Address of the factory contract to add

params._feeType: Type of the fee to add in the module
params._module: Address of the module contract to add fee to
params._newFeePercentage: Percentage of fee to add in the module (denominated in preciseUnits eg 1% = 1e16)

params._module: Address of the module contract to add

params._id: New ID of the resource contract
params._resource: Address of the resource contract to add

params._setToken: Address of the SetToken contract to add

params._feeRecipient: Address of the initial protocol fee recipient

params._feeType: Type of the fee to edit in the module
params._module: Address of the module contract to edit fee
params._newFeePercentage: Percentage of fee to edit in the module (denominated in preciseUnits eg 1% = 1e16)

params._newFeeRecipient: Address of the new protocol fee recipient

params._resourceIds: List of resource IDs associated with the resources

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._factory: Address of the factory contract to remove

params._module: Address of the module contract to remove

params._id: ID of the resource contract to remove

params._setToken: Address of the SetToken contract to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Controller

addFactory(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a factory

addFee(address,uint256,uint256).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a fee to a module

addModule(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a module

addResource(address,uint256).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to add a resource

addSet(address).notice: PRIVILEGED FACTORY FUNCTION. Adds a newly deployed SetToken as an enabled SetToken.

methods.constructor: Initializes the initial fee recipient on deployment.

editFee(address,uint256,uint256).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit a fee in an existing module

editFeeRecipient(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to edit the protocol fee recipient

initialize(address[],address[],address[].notice: Initializes any predeployed factories, modules, and resources post deployment. Note: This function can only be called by the owner once to batch initialize the initial system contracts.

isSystemContract(address).notice: Check if a contract address is a module, Set, resource, factory or controller

removeFactory(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a factory

removeModule(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a module

removeResource(uint256).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a resource

removeSet(address).notice: PRIVILEGED GOVERNANCE FUNCTION. Allows governance to remove a Set
